imageName.tooltip: The Container (Docker) Image for app Ex. bitnami/nginx.

containerPort.tooltip: The port on which the app can be reached inside the container.

servicePort.tooltip: The port on which the service will be listening.

version.tooltip: The Application version used for deployments.

isIstio.tooltip:
If istio is selected, it generates the Istio VirtualService, DestinationRule, and Gateway 
specification. It supports a service mesh by specifying two basic pieces of architecture for 
your cluster, a data plane and a control plane.

tag.tooltip: The container image tag, e.g. latest, and this tag must be in the image repository

targetPlatform.tooltip: The targeted Kubernetes orchestration engine, e.g. AWS EKS or OpenShift.

replicaCount.tooltip: The number of replicas of an app's pod.

nodeSelector.tooltip:
For the pod to be eligible to run on a node,
 the pod must have the indicated
key-value pairs as the label on the node.
This lets you target specific node types such as a GPU for ML workloads.

imagePullPolicy.tooltip:
The image policy:
 1-Always: Always pull image from registry.
 2-IfNotPresent: pull image if only not present.
